content.text:
# The Headies Award for Best Music Video

}}
The Headies Award for Best Music Video is an award presented at The Headies, a ceremony that was established in 2006 and originally called the Hip Hop World Awards. This award goes to the director. It was first awarded to Jude Okoye for the music video for "Get Squared" by P-Square in 2006.
